conbody.p: Salesforce originCRUD operation header attributeWhen the Salesforce origin subscribes to notifications and reads changed data from a PushTopic, the origin includes the CRUD operation type for a record in the sdc.operation.type header attribute.

The Salesforce origin uses the following values in the sdc.operation.type record header attribute to represent the operation type:
1 for INSERT
2 for DELETE
3 for UPDATE
5 for unsupported operations, such as UNDELETED Records that are undeleted contain only the record ID. If you need the record data, you can use the Salesforce Lookup to retrieve it.
